events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund immediately because I am very disappointed.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to customer's request for money back because of incorrect product delivery.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. to handle the refund request and resolve the issue promptly.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support, and I’m here to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to process your refund faster?
Here is my order number 789123, and attached is a photo showing that I received the wrong product instead of the shoes I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method and arrange a courier to pick up the incorrect item.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the swift handling of this issue.
Your refund has been processed and you will receive confirmation once the pickup is scheduled. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and that the issue with the wrong item delivery is fully resolved.
Since we have not received any further inquiries, this case is now closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
